==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|[[street]]|[[way]]<br>[[path]]}}

===Etymology===
The sense ''street'' comes from the clarifying use of [[街]] to specify the intended sense of [[道]].

The sense ''subdistrict'' comes from the combination of the two separate words [[asyndeton|without a conjunction]]: an area's [[街]]s and [[道]]s, the area itself.
